name: PopCap Games Rendering Effect
summary: A POPFX file is a rendering effect used by a PopCap Games video game, such as Plants Vs. Zombies 2. For example, a POPFX file may be used to apply shader properties to an in-game object. POPFX files are not meant to be opened by players.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Various PopCap Games video games, including Plants Vs. Zombies 2 and Peggle 2
